sentence: I swear to God, the Republicans who are trying to impose a Christian nationalist theocracy on all of us would be some of the first people thrown into the gulags that they want to build because as much as they say they hate gay and trans people, they somehow always end up inadvertently revealing how much they love gay and trans people when nobody else is looking if you're picking up what I'm putting down.
